concept.title: Limit the Size of Arrays
concept.shortdesc: If there are a large number of rows and columns for a rectangular array, the systemtakes a long time to create the copies. By default, the number of array elements generates by one command is not over 100,000. The value is stored in the system variable MaxArray. It ranges from 100 to 10000000. If you want to change the value of MaxArray, you must type MaxArray with the capitalization shown.
